result.title: Where can we find HackerEarth ratings?
result.content: Hey guys, so this past HackerEarth March Easy was rated. However, on the profiles of participants (I checked five or so), I couldn't find a rating score. (For example, say hello to lalit and notice how ctrl+f rating only returns a TopCoder rating.) Does anyone know where the rating can be found? Apologies if this was previously asked and answered.
